name: JO
text: Such a lovely experience from start to finish. Georgie explained everything clearly and my welded bracelet fits perfectly.

name: HG
text: I booked matching pieces and we both loved them. Really calm appointment and so much care taken with the fit and finish.

name: SK
text: Beautiful chains and a very professional service. My bracelet still looks amazing and I get compliments all the time.

name: TM
text: Georgie made the whole appointment feel really personal. The welded ring is exactly what I wanted.

name: ES
text: Booked for a keepsake and could not be happier. Great attention to detail and a lovely studio atmosphere.

name: CJ
text: Excellent experience and so friendly. The anklet was measured perfectly and the whole process was quick and seamless.
